panels.description: Total Energy consumption Airco over selected time interval

targets.query: SELECT sum("airco-zolder-en-slaapkamer_mean") / 60000 as azs_sum FROM "smappee-data-2" WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: Airco kWh

panels.description: Total Energy consumption Stopkontakten Zolder over selected time interval

targets.query: SELECT (sum("zolder-stopkontakten-network-switch_mean") + sum("zolder-stopkontakten-printer_mean") + sum("zolder-bureau_mean")) / 60000 as zsp_sum FROM "smappee-data-2" WHERE $timeFilter

panels.title: Zolder Stopkontakten kWh

panels.description: Mains voltage minimal and maximal value in selected time interval

targets.query: SELECT min(voltage_mean_values) as Min from (SELECT "voltage_mean" as voltage_mean_values FROM "smappee-data-2") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(8760h) fill(null)
SELECT max(voltage_mean_values)  as Max from (SELECT "voltage_mean" as voltage_mean_values FROM "smappee-data-2") WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(8760h) fill(null)

panels.title: Voltage main Min/Max
